articles.description: In January, Department of Defense contractor Ghost Robotics will unleash four semi-autonomous robots at Tyndall Air Force Base in Florida as part of a plan to replace stationary surveillance cameras.
articles.content: Massachusetts-based Boston Dynamics was behind most of these examples. But another company is revolutionizing what robotic versions of mans best friend can do, and it says its latest creation might b… [+3951 chars]

articles.title: Don't buy the PS5 or Xbox Series X yet, E-Sports host says - Fox Business
articles.description: Esports host Kate Bedford argues the demand for Playstation 5, Xbox Series X consoles is 'enormous' already.Subscribe to Fox Business! https://bit.ly/2D9Cdse...
